item.title: 美国正加强其核能供应链建设
item.description: 如果新反应堆最终建成，它们将需要大量燃料。【原文：New reactors will need a lot more fuel if they eventually get built.】

item.title: 安德森·霍洛维茨基金领投3亿美元融资，支持独角兽企业Kavak
item.description: 据这家初创企业首席执行官透露，墨西哥在线二手车经销商Kavak在由安德森·霍洛维茨基金领投的股权融资中筹集了3亿美元。【原文：Mexico-based online used car dealer Kavak raised $300 million in an equity round led by Andreessen Horowitz, according to the startup’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 双子星已准备好让谷歌搜索退休
item.description: Alphabet的人工智能已发展到足以接管的程度。【原文：Alphabet’s AI has matured to the point where it can take over】

item.title: 乔希·库什纳的Thrive Capital公司完成100亿美元新一轮融资
item.description:
OpenAI、Stripe、SpaceX和Skims的投资方表示，其采取的是"生死与共"的投资策略。

【原文：

The backer of OpenAI, Stripe, SpaceX and Skims says it’s taking “ride-or-die” approach to investing. 

】

item.title: 澳大利亚揭示为何生产力疲软成为新的通胀难题
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行被迫加息，因经济增长温和回升助推通胀。【原文：The RBA has been forced to hike rates as a modest pick up in growth stokes inflation.】

item.title: 减肥药热潮推动爱尔兰制药出口生产
item.description: 诺和诺德宣布投资爱尔兰中部地区生产基地，与礼来公司展开竞争【原文：Novo Nordisk says it’s investing in production in central Ireland, doing battle with Eli Lilly】

item.title: Universa的斯皮茨纳格尔预测标普指数将在崩盘前飙升至8000点
item.description: 美国股市长达数年的上涨行情远未结束——至少目前如此，Universa Investments首席投资官兼创始人马克·斯皮茨纳格尔如是说。【原文：The years-long climb in US stocks is far from over — at least for now, according to Mark Spitznagel, chief investment officer and founder of Universa Investments.】

item.title: 赞比亚国家矿业公司考虑设立自有金属贸易部门
item.description: 赞比亚国有矿业公司正制定计划，启动大宗商品交易业务，旨在通过加剧该国矿产资源的竞争来获取更多价值。【原文：Zambia’s state mining company is developing plans to start trading commodities to capture more value from building competition over the country’s mineral wealth.】

item.title: 莫迪抵达之际，印度人工智能发展迎来混乱开局
item.description: 印度近年来规模最大的商业峰会本周陷入混乱，数百名代表因突发安保封锁被困现场，无水无食。这场本应彰显该国人工智能崛起优势的标志性盛会，如今却蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：India’s biggest business summit in years descended into chaos this week after hundreds of delegates were left stranded without food or water during a sudden security lockdown, a black eye for a marquee gathering that was supposed to trumpet the country’s AI ascendancy.】

item.title: 美银调查显示投资者对资本支出竞赛的担忧升至历史高位
item.description: 美国银行最新基金经理调查显示，创纪录数量的投资者认为企业支出过高。【原文：A record number of investors say companies are spending far too much, according to Bank of America Corp.’s latest fund manager survey.】

item.title: 欧盟国家抵制风险或削弱最新俄罗斯制裁效力
item.description: 欧盟试图惩罚俄罗斯用于非法出售石油的外国港口和银行，但该举措正遭遇阻力，这可能削弱欧盟最新制裁方案的效力。【原文：The European Union’s attempt to penalize foreign ports and banks that Russia uses to illicitly sell oil is running into opposition, threatening to weaken the bloc’s latest sanctions package.】

item.title: 凯雷、贝莱德收购廉价软件贷款以提升信贷违约掉期收益
item.description: 随着抵押贷款支持证券的管理者抛售大批被视为易受人工智能冲击的银行贷款，部分买家正试图从这个被超低利润率压榨逾一年的市场中榨取利润。【原文：As managers of collateralized loan obligations sell a rash of bank loans seen as vulnerable to AI, some buyers are seeking to pry profits out of a market that’s been squeezed by rock-bottom margins for over a year.】

item.title: 瑞宝证券称，鲁比奥承诺后匈牙利债券涨势似泡沫
item.description: 资产管理公司英杰华投资指出，在美方最新承诺对匈牙利总理欧尔班提供财政支持后，匈牙利债券延续涨势，这引发了市场对此轮上涨可持续性的新质疑。【原文：Hungarian bonds extended gains after the latest US pledge of financial support for Prime Minister Viktor Orban, raising new questions about the sustainability of the rally, according to asset manager Aviva Investors.】

item.title: 投资者蜂拥抢购南非债券，当周债券拍卖热潮涌现
item.description: 南非政府债券每周拍卖需求激增，因投资者对下周预算案的乐观情绪升温。【原文：Demand surged at South Africa’s weekly government bond auction as investor optimism grew ahead of next week’s budget.】

item.title: 斯塔默的新建住房目标正因房屋建设量骤降而面临瓦解
item.description: 英格兰的房屋建造量正朝着十多年来最低水平下滑，这使得基尔·斯塔默首相承诺的150万套住房建设目标更难实现。【原文：Housebuilding in England is on track to fall to its lowest level in more than a decade, pushing Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s pledge to deliver 1.5 million homes further out of reach.】

item.title: 新兴市场在假期与美联储焦虑中谨慎行事
item.description: 周二，新兴市场股票和债券基本持平，美元走强以及包括中国和韩国在内的主要市场因假期导致交易量萎缩，限制了市场波动。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and bonds were little changed on Tuesday, curbed by a firmer dollar and thinner trading volumes due to holidays in major markets, including China and South Korea.】

item.title: 选股者在人工智能颠覆浪潮中发现机遇
item.description:
多头表示，部分股票因市场担忧人工智能的影响而遭过度抛售。【原文：

Selloffs have been overdone for some stocks on fears of AI’s impact, bulls say.

】

item.title: 加拿大拥抱亚洲以拯救受美国关税挤压的汽车核心产业
item.description:
美国汽车制造商目前仅占加拿大组装汽车总量的四分之一。随着马克·卡尼领导的政府将目光投向海外，这些企业正逐渐失去影响力。

【原文：

US automakers now make just a quarter of the cars assembled in Canada. They’re losing influence with Mark Carney’s government, which is looking overseas.

】

item.title: 委内瑞拉西斯内罗斯集团筹集10亿美元重建基金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，委内瑞拉商界最具权势家族之一的掌门人阿德里安娜·西斯内罗斯正牵头筹集10亿美元，用于设立私募股权基金，投资于这个饱受危机蹂躏、正寻求重建的国家。【原文：Adriana Cisneros, head of one of the Venezuelan business community’s most powerful families, is leading efforts to raise $1 billion for a private equity fund to invest in the crisis-ravaged nation as it seeks to rebuild, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Shein因销售儿童样貌性爱玩偶面临欧盟调查及罚款风险
item.description: Shein因在该中国电商平台销售儿童样貌的性爱玩偶，面临欧盟巨额罚款风险，监管机构已就此展开全面调查。【原文：Shein risks hefty European Union penalties after regulators opened a full-scale probe into sales of child-like sex dolls on the Chinese e-commerce platform.】

item.title: 随着法规变更，瑞典能源巨头Vattenfall将退出法国能源零售市场
item.description: 瑞典能源公司Vattenfall AB正准备退出法国能源零售市场，因电价持续下跌，且供应商已无法从法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）购买折扣电价。【原文：Swedish utility Vattenfall AB is poised to exit the French energy retail market, as prices decline and suppliers no longer have the option to buy discounted power from Electricite de France SA.】

item.title: 选股者在市场人工智能恐慌中迎来闪光时刻
item.description: 对人工智能的恐惧正在美国股市肆虐。对于选股者而言，现在或许正是贪婪的时机。【原文：AI fear is running amok in the US equity market. For stock pickers, now might be the time to get greedy.】

item.title: 南非电力交易商要求为埃斯孔公司改革制定路线图
item.description: 南非电力交易商要求将国营电力公司埃斯康控股有限公司的"最终状态"明确定义，作为开放电力市场的必要措施。【原文：South African electricity traders want the “end state” of utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. defined as a necessary measure to open up the power market.】

item.title: 波罗的海海域多年未见的严寒天气威胁削减俄罗斯大宗商品出口
item.description: 俄罗斯波罗的海主要商品港口周边海域出现15年来最广阔的海冰覆盖，可能因缺乏能应对这种海况的船舶而限制该国部分大规模出口计划。【原文：The most extensive sea ice in 15 years around Russia’s key Baltic Sea commodity ports could curb a chunk of the nation’s vast exports program because of a shortage of vessels that can cope with the conditions.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心意外恶化，经济复苏受挫
item.description: 德国投资者信心指数2月意外下滑，这令市场对欧洲最大经济体即将迎来强劲复苏的预期有所降温。【原文：German investor optimism unexpectedly fell in February, tempering hopes that Europe’s largest economy is on the cusp of a strong revival.】

item.title: 洲际酒店集团宣布9.5亿美元股票回购计划，首席财务官看好中美市场增长前景
item.description: 洲际酒店集团宣布启动9.5亿美元的股票回购计划，此举表明其对中国旅游业复苏充满信心，并对美国市场保持乐观态度。【原文：Intercontinental Hotels Group Plc launched a $950 million share buyback program as it signaled confidence in a travel recovery in China and remains optimistic about the US market.】

item.title: 印度计划两年内投入2000亿美元发展人工智能
item.description: 印度联邦政府一位高级部长表示，该国预计在两年内吸引超过2000亿美元的人工智能驱动型投资，这凸显了这个全球人口最多国家在新技术领域日益高涨的雄心。【原文：India expects to attract more than $200 billion in artificial intelligence-driven investments over the course of two years, a top federal minister said, underscoring the world’s most populous nation’s surging ambitions in the new technology.】

item.title: 小麦价格下跌，交易清淡且供应充足迹象显现
item.description: 小麦价格跌至近一周低点，因交易商评估美国小麦种植区在寒流过后将出现更干燥、更温暖的天气，这提振了供应前景。【原文：Wheat fell to the lowest in nearly a week as traders assessed the prospect of drier and warmer weather across US wheat-growing areas after a cold snap, boosting the supply outlook.】

item.title: 南非失业率降至2020年以来最低水平
item.description: 南非第四季度失业率降至五年多来最低水平，社区与社会服务及建筑行业新增就业岗位。【原文：South Africa’s unemployment rate dropped to the lowest level in more than five years in the fourth quarter, as the community and social services and construction sectors added workers.】

item.title: 三井住友银行、宝盛银行等机构在印度设立科技中心
item.description: 知情人士透露，包括三井住友银行和宝盛集团在内的全球金融机构正计划通过设立全球能力中心来扩大在印度的业务。【原文：Global financial firms, including Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. and Julius Baer Group, are planning to expand in India by setting up global capability centers, according to people familiar with the matter.】
